data.message:
Dear Facebook,

I have been trying to contact customer service without any response. I'm pissed. 

Our relationship has been okay since making the account, you've continued to make changes to yourself for better or for worse and I've continued to use your site without complaint until now. I have been receiving OBSCENE amount of Bot Requests from bots that obviously took a google stock photo and made a fake Facebook account and have no friends and no connection  to me. This poses a problem because recently you guys wouldn't let me keep my MODELING NAME as my facebook name because it 'wasn't really who I am' and there aren't any forms to fix this problem. This bothers me because I've had this account under my Modeling name Bhecka Angelique Sin for six years now but obviously, i'm not real. I have entire websites dedicated to this name with a direct link to my Facebook account and using my real name obviously puts me in a form of danger. What about all of the music Celebrities who use fake names on their personal facebook accounts? Movie Stars? 

Please PLEASE email me back with a solution as I would very much so like to change my name back. The name was reported by an angry family member who was feeling vindictive that day.
